story_27_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Lady Caitlin, it appears that this is indeed the
location indicated on the map.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: But it seems Lady Cynthia has yet to arrive.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
And yet SHE is the one who called us out here.
This is revealing her lack of punctuality, I see.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
My, what a yawn that was. Are you perhaps
low on sleep?
story_27_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I have been getting quite enough sleep. That yawn
was due to boredom.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I thought that an event as big as the PML would
provide lovely battles with the strongest
sync pairs...
story_27_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
but I can count on a single hand the number of
satisfying battles I’ve had.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_0900_10: You must forgive me if I yawn once or twice.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Haha. I believe your standards for a superb battle
are ever so slightly too high, Lady Caitlin.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
That having been said, with a Trainer as strong
as Lady Cynthia on our team, I suppose such a
thing is unavoidable.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Well, in that respect, I guess you could say we
made a mistake in our team selection.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_1300_10: Besides, with Cynthia, I’ve yet to...
story_27_01000/2401_1001_1400_10: Sorry to keep you two waiting.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_1500_10: Forgive me. It took a while to get changed.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_1600_10: If I’m not mistaken, that outfit is...
story_27_01000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Yes, it’s my sygna suit. It was designed based on
my Kommo-o.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_1800_10:
For our upcoming match with
[Name:PlayerNickname ], I’ve decided to wear
my sygna suit and battle with Kommo-o.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_1900_10:
I wanted to have a Pokémon battle with you
two to test out this change and make any
final adjustments.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_2000_10: Our upcoming match? Correct me if I’m wrong...
story_27_01000/2401_1001_2100_10:
but didn’t you say just a few days ago that you
planned to wait until you had further time to train
Kommo-o before battling with him in the PML?
story_27_01000/2401_1001_2200_10: Yes. But I’ve changed my mind.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Thanks to his daily training with Garchomp,
Kommo-o has rapidly gotten stronger.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_2400_10:
Just like [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team, which
becomes more powerful with each victory.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_2500_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Kommo-o have
both grown so much stronger on Pasio. It seemed
fitting to battle with Kommo-o in the quarterfinals.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_2600_10: With Kommo-o and me at our current power...
story_27_01000/2401_1001_2800_10:
In tomorrow’s battle, Kommo-o and I will show
the world what we’re made of!
story_27_01000/2401_1001_3000_10:
You sure do hold that team—no,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]—in high regard,
don’t you?
story_27_01000/2401_1001_3100_10:
But never mind that. Let’s get this practice battle
over with, shall we?
story_27_01000/2401_1001_3400_10:
I know I asked you for this battle, Caitlin, but I
also have another request.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_3500_10: Could you please give it everything you’ve got?
story_27_01000/2401_1001_3700_10:
I’ve been watching you closely ever since we
formed this team.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_3800_10:
You have undoubtedly become stronger, and
I want to test your newfound strength in a
serious battle.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_3900_10: Because you’re my teammate, my friend, and...
story_27_01000/2401_1001_4100_10: Me? You consider me your rival?
story_27_01000/2401_1001_4200_10:
Why wouldn’t I? Don’t tell me you don’t feel the
same way.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_4300_10:
My, how good you are at motivating others.
Perhaps you have some psychic powers as well.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_4400_10:
I’m pleased that you value me so highly, but
haven’t you forgotten?
story_27_01000/2401_1001_4500_10: I have never once won a battle against you.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_4800_10: Hmph, you really are a good motivator. Very well.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_4900_10:
Here we go, Reuniclus! Let’s go all out from
the start!
story_27_01000/2401_1001_5000_10: I swear I will beat you this time, Cynthia!
story_27_01000/2401_1001_5100_10: I beg your pardon, Lady Caitlin...
story_27_01000/2401_1001_5200_10:
but it seems as if you have lost control of your
emotions, like you did so often in the past.
story_27_01000/2401_1001_5300_10:
I don’t care! No, rather, I am daring to let my
emotions run free right now!
story_27_01000/2401_1001_5400_10: So that I may win this battle with elegance!
story_27_01000/2401_1001_5600_10: Give me everything you’ve got, Caitlin!
